about_the_game:
Can You Survive the Wilderness?

Step into a brutal, untamed world where survival is your only mission. Scavenge, craft, and hunt as you face the dangers of nature. Explore at your own pace, build shelter, chop down trees, mine for valuable resources, and fight to stay alive against the elements and wildlife. With every choice impacting your survival, can you rise above the odds?
Features:
•Open-World Exploration: Roam freely across a vast, open world that encourages you to explore at your own pace. Whether you're finding rare resources or escaping dangerous wildlife, the world is yours to uncover.
•Realistic Survival Mechanics: Experience true survival as you manage hunger, thirst, sickness and health while battling the relentless forces of nature.
•Gather, Craft & Build: Harvest resources from the environment—chop trees, mine ores, and gather plants. Use these materials to craft tools, weapons and sturdy shelters to keep you safe.
•Hunt & Defend: Track and hunt wild animals for food or defend yourself from the more aggressive ones. Each hunt is a dangerous challenge that could make or break your survival.
•Dynamic Environment: Adapt to a living, breathing world with changing weather, day-night cycles, and seasonal shifts that affect your strategy and survival.
•Challenging Resource Management: Your every move counts—manage your inventory wisely, find sustainable food sources and craft tools to improve your chances of survival.
•Immersive Realism: With deep crafting systems, realistic physics and a focus on resource gathering, no two survival experiences are the same.
•Build & Customize Shelters: Whether it's a simple hut or an elaborate fortress, design and build your own safe haven with materials you gather throughout the world.
Ongoing Updates & Community Support: Carpathian Survival is constantly evolving, with regular updates bringing new or updated features to enrich your survival experience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 2080 TI (12 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 6750 XT (12 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVMe Solid State Drive
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700K, AMD Ryzen 7 3800X, or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3080 (12 GB) or AMD RX 6800 XT (16 GB) or faster
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 100 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: NVMe Solid State Drive

short_description: Experience the untamed beauty of the Carpathian wilderness. Gather resources, chop trees, mine for materials, craft tools, and build shelter to withstand the harsh environment. Hunt wildlife and master essential survival skills as you navigate the untamed mountains.
